name: MindsDB
headline: AI that works at work. Turnkey. Private.
description:
MindsDB is a fast-growing AI startup headquartered in San Francisco, California. As a leading innovator bringing AI and Data together, our passion is empowering companies to easily build AI capabilities that can Think, Understand and Orchestrate: enabling teams to move from prototyping & experimentation to production in a fast & scalable way.

MindsDB was founded in 2017 by Adam Carrigan and Jorge Torres, inspired by Ian M. Banks's Culture series, in which super AI systems called Minds collaborate with other forms of life to accomplish incredible goals. Starting as an Open-Source project, MindsDB has grown to be one of the most widely used AI-Data platforms in the world, with a growing community and more than 700 contributor developers from every corner of the globe.

We are backed with over $55M in funding from Mayfield, Benchmark, YCombinator, and nVidia. MindsDB is also recognized by Forbes as one of America's most promising AI companies (2021) and by Gartner as a Cool Vendor for Data and AI (2022).
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:developer-tools; industry:machine-learning; industry:open-source; industry:enterprise-software; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Adam Carrigan, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder @MindsDB üöÄ @Forbes Most Promising AI Companies ü§ñ @Ycombinator (W20), ex-management consultant @Deloitte, @Cambridge_Uni grad

founders.name: Jorge Torres, Founder
founders.description: Jorge Torres is the Co-founder & CEO of MindsDB. He is also a visiting scholar at UC Berkeley researching machine learning automation and explainability. Prior to founding MindsDB, he worked for a number of data-intensive start-ups, most recently working with Aneesh Chopra (the first CTO in the US government) building data systems that analyze billions of patients records and lead to highest savings for millions of patients.

# MindsDB:The **Enterprise AGI** Platform
# The #1 AI platform for answering questions from ALL enterprise data.
## Solve enterprise problems using AI with human-level intelligence
Your LLM with the built-in power to personalize AI agents & apps.
[Get Started](https://www.mindsdb.com/<http:/mdb.ai/register?__hstc=77686859.3c31a8b17eb60e1d9f7440b5c217b438.1739981048410.1739981048410.1739981048410.1&__hssc=77686859.1.1739981048410&__hsfp=1951743191>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a8755be8bcc86e6307def8/6769dfb94c49b3d55e2cbec3_unnamed.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a8755be8bcc86e6307def8/677eb836a1bf8b1274bbba89_use%20cases.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a8755be8bcc86e6307def8/6769e52492cb2cb0181439a2_toops.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a8755be8bcc86e6307def8/6769e5de814ef2c089afadd5_poswedrdby.svg)
### **Build AI Apps That Can Solve Real Enterprise Challenges**
**Minds** - AI with human-level knowledge across all enterprise data
CASE STUDY
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a8755be8bcc86e6307def8/6769e81616a161de4a356571_logo-navy.svg)
**Sema4 delivers state-of-the-art AI agents for enterprise workflow automation. They rely on Minds for real-time data.**
**"Our work with MindsDB will greatly expand how our agents interact with data, enhancing our ability to tackle complex Enterprise challenges with unprecedented speed and accuracy. We are engaged in opportunities that will deliver substantial cost savings and productivity gains for our clients, as our agents automate error-prone processes and free up their workforce to focus on higher-value tasks."**
**- Rob Bearden, CEO**
**Ambitious teams** build AI on top of MindsDB products**.**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a8755be8bcc86e6307def8/66e96319761edf9aeb076b6e_amazon-web-services-3%202.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/667520bae0a577069a6b305f/66a893043aa963736237811d_Google-Logo.wine%201.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a8755be8bcc86e6307def8/66e96319761edf9aeb076b72_hitachi.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a8755be8bcc86e6307def8/66e96319761edf9aeb076b8b_hubspot.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/667520bae0a577069a6b305f/66a893033aa96373623780a1_Ikea_logo.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a8755be8bcc86e6307def8/66e96319761edf9aeb076b91_nvidia-wordmark-1%201.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/667520bae0a577069a6b305f/66a893033aa963736237806c_Nokia_2023.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a8755be8bcc86e6307def8/66e9631a761edf9aeb076bea_pepsico.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a8755be8bcc86e6307def8/66e9631a761edf9aeb076bad_66a893033aa96373623780a9_Porsche_Logo%201.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/667520bae0a577069a6b305f/66a893023aa9637362378001_SAP_2011_logo.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a8755be8bcc86e6307def8/66e96319761edf9aeb076b97_zoho.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/667520bae0a577069a6b305f/66a893033aa9637362378088_Walmart_logo.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/667520bae0a577069a6b305f/66a893023aa9637362377fe5_tata-1%201.svg)

### From**Global Enterprises** to**Cutting-Edge AI Startups**
[Get Started](https://www.mindsdb.com/<http:/mdb.ai/register?__hstc=77686859.3c31a8b17eb60e1d9f7440b5c217b438.1739981048410.1739981048410.1739981048410.1&__hssc=77686859.1.1739981048410&__hsfp=1951743191>)
### **Connect and Prepare** Your**Data** with**MindsDB**
**Solve data sprawl** ‚Äîno matter how sparse or messy‚Äîacross databases, data warehouses, and SaaS applications by using the world‚Äôs most sophisticated federated query engine, built for real-time AI workloads
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a8755be8bcc86e6307def8/675882b459da20b1e5739a9a_Github.svg)Learn More](https://www.mindsdb.com/<http:/github.com/mindsdb/mindsdb>)
[Deploy](https://www.mindsdb.com/<https:/docs.mindsdb.com/setup/self-hosted/docker>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a8755be8bcc86e6307def8/677d478dfba133a4ba864a7f_logocircle.png)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a8755be8bcc86e6307def8/67574e3849799be422ce27d3_watch-demo-button.svg)](https://www.mindsdb.com/<https:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=D_BoVJeDGLw>)
### **Ship AI** with Human-Level Intelligence across Your Data with**Minds**
Build AI Applications and Agents with human-level cognition to answer all kinds of questions from enterprise data (structured and unstructured) in a secure and scalable way
[Book a Demo](https://www.mindsdb.com/<#get-started-contact>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a8755be8bcc86e6307def8/677d418e8a9133b4cb47c6b8_ai-layer-cake.svg)
### **Run the AI Stack Enterprises Choose to Successfully Implement Their AI Strategy**
**In your VPC, on-prem or Managed Cloud**
### **Build Your Enterprise AGI** to Answer All Kinds of Questions
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a8755be8bcc86e6307def8/677c354189e4a440e61ec7d9_demo-image.svg)[Book a Demo](https://www.mindsdb.com/<#get-started-contact>)

**Tell us about your use case, and we'll follow up with tailored guidance on next steps.**

# MindsDB:The **Enterprise AGI** Platform
# The #1 AI platform for answering questions from ALL enterprise data.
## Solve enterprise problems using AI with human-level intelligence
Your LLM with the built-in power to personalize AI agents & apps.
Get Started‚ü®22‚ü©

### **Build AI Apps That Can Solve Real Enterprise Challenges**
**Minds** - AI with human-level knowledge across all enterprise data
CASE STUDY
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a8755be8bcc86e6307def8/6769e81616a161de4a356571_logo-navy.svg)
**Sema4 delivers state-of-the-art AI agents for enterprise workflow automation. They rely on Minds for real-time data.**
**"Our work with MindsDB will greatly expand how our agents interact with data, enhancing our ability to tackle complex Enterprise challenges with unprecedented speed and accuracy. We are engaged in opportunities that will deliver substantial cost savings and productivity gains for our clients, as our agents automate error-prone processes and free up their workforce to focus on higher-value tasks."**
**- Rob Bearden, CEO**
**Ambitious teams** build AI on top of MindsDB products**.**

generated_description:
**MindsDB: Bridging AI and Data for Enterprises**

Founded in 2017 by Adam Carrigan and Jorge Torres, MindsDB is a rapidly growing AI startup based in San Francisco, California. Inspired by the visionary "Culture" series by Ian M. Banks, MindsDB aims to create sophisticated AI systems that not only understand data but also collaborate across various domains to tackle complex enterprise challenges. 

Initially launched as an open-source project, MindsDB has blossomed into a prominent player in the AI-data platform space. It boasts a vibrant community of over 700 contributors globally, showcasing its commitment to innovation and collaboration. Backed by significant funding exceeding $55 million from prestigious investors including Mayfield, Benchmark, YCombinator, and NVIDIA, MindsDB is recognized by Forbes as one of America's most promising AI companies and honored by Gartner as a Cool Vendor for Data and AI in 2022.

**Mission and Vision**

MindsDB‚Äôs mission is to make AI accessible and effective for every organization. They believe in building "AI that works at work," offering turnkey solutions that enable teams to transition seamlessly from experimentation to production. The goal is clear: empower enterprises to harness the full potential of AI for data analysis, decision-making, and operational efficiency.

**Core Products and Offerings**

MindsDB offers two primary products:

1. **Minds** - A turnkey solution designed for building enterprise-grade AI systems.
2. **MindsDB** - An open-source, federated query engine that empowers AI systems to connect with various data sources for real-time insights.

With a streamlined approach, MindsDB helps businesses address data sprawl and complexities, enabling them to deliver accurate and relevant AI solutions tailored to their unique needs.

**Community and Support**

MindsDB values community engagement, offering resources like a dedicated blog, events, and community programs where developers can collaborate and contribute. They also run initiatives to enhance user experience, including early adopter programs and support channels via Slack for real-time assistance.

**The Future of AI with MindsDB**

As enterprises increasingly recognize the need for AI integration into their operations, MindsDB is at the forefront, providing tools that fuse data with intelligent insights. With a mission that resonates across industries, their innovative approach ensures that organizations can build AI capabilities that not only understand but also act upon the data, thus optimizing workflows and driving productivity.

Explore MindsDB's offerings and learn more about how they can transform your enterprise‚Äôs approach to AI by visiting [MindsDB's website](https://www.mindsdb.com/).
